page.title: 15 QUARRIES
page.content: In our area there are two quarries. One is called{Ure Valley Aggregates} Ltd and the other is called{R.W.Potter {(Limestone) L.T.D}at Potgate.They both do the same sort of work.When you start a quarry you take the top soil off and store it in large heaps which are kept for restoration then the gravel is exposed.You dig it out with a dragline which is put into a dump truck and taken to a separating plant which separates the sand from gravel.The sand is washed and goes on one pile.The gravel goes through a grading screen which separates it into different sizes 10mm,14mm,20mm,40mm which also goes onto separate piles which in turn are loaded onto lorries with a loading shovel.To run a quarry you need 6 men depending on the size of the unit.
